name: Office Manager
description:
My submission to the Halloween Jam 2021, not a horror game (but in compliance with the theme, you play a ghost).

Theme:

Ghosts doing Normal People Things

Hence, you play a ghost and float around an office, completing tasks in the hopes of being promoted to office manager...

The assets come from the sources below,  but I made the level 's layout, so it's a little bare bones, nonetheless: Enjoy !

Office assets: Unity asset store

Music: https://www.royaltyfree-music.com

Characters + animations: https://www.mixamo.com/#/
